channel.title: Hacked on Runescape
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
I am a level 117 on Runescape and i got hacked about a month ago for 250M cash. I lost everything, Then i recovered my account and made 15M then after I'd got enough money to start making more money i got hacked again. I'm not sure what to do to get all of my cash back?
Ideas?

item.title: Hacked on Runescape
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Learn how to merch, and CoonHunter’s idea is good to try. Learning how to follow the market in RuneScape can help you in real life things like the Stock Exchange also.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked on Runescape
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:3, topic:387752”]Generally, if you can convince Jagex of the problem via parents emailing service (i had to use this) they can wipe all data back to the original when the account was first created. I had to do this when RS4Gold had a mixup between me buying 5M and selling my account. I sent them the money, and all of a sudden, what I sent them, plus the offer before-hand was put into my paypal, got that fixed but they refused the account. I hacked it back, and had to convince Jagex there was an issue, and someone must have known my info, so they wiped it back to the originals. Now, RS4Gold emails me 2-3 times a week asking for assistance on getting my account back lol.

Basically, if you can manage to convince Jagex your account information was leaked, and you need it wiped, they MIGHT do it.[/quote]

I did that a long time ago to my account.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked on Runescape
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Generally, if you can convince Jagex of the problem via parents emailing service (i had to use this) they can wipe all data back to the original when the account was first created. I had to do this when RS4Gold had a mixup between me buying 5M and selling my account. I sent them the money, and all of a sudden, what I sent them, plus the offer before-hand was put into my paypal, got that fixed but they refused the account. I hacked it back, and had to convince Jagex there was an issue, and someone must have known my info, so they wiped it back to the originals. Now, RS4Gold emails me 2-3 times a week asking for assistance on getting my account back lol.

Basically, if you can manage to convince Jagex your account information was leaked, and you need it wiped, they MIGHT do it.

Read full topic
